results.title: The effect of the anti-diabetic drug metformin on musculoskeletal pain: A cross-sectional study with 21,889 individuals from the UK biobank.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @SPECIES_9606 @@@People@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ were less likely to report @<m>DISEASE_Shoulder_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000070599 @@@back, knee, neck/shoulder@@@ and multisite @DISEASE_Musculoskeletal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D059352 @@@musculoskeletal pain@@@ than those not taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Carvalho-E-Silva AP, Harmer AR, Ferreira ML, Ferreira PH. The effect of the anti-diabetic drug metformin on musculoskeletal pain: A cross-sectional study with 21,889 individuals from the UK biobank. Eur J Pain. 2021 Jul;25(6):1264-1273. PMID: 33561890
